name: navy-ui-kit
title: Navy
desc: A confident SaaS template for product-driven startups.
article:
A sharp, structured light-mode template built for modern startups that want to launch fast and look established.


  • Learn more about Navy
  • Get the full access bundle including all premium themes and lifetime access: https://lexingtonthemes.com/

Features

  • Blog tags
  • Reusable components
  • User dashboard
  • Search powered with Fuse JS
  • Content collections
  • Seo Optimized
  • Ongoing updates
  • Style guide
  • Astro RSS
  • Astro SEO
  • Astro Sitemap
  • Tailwind CSS Forms
  • Tailwind Typography
